WorkItem.Description:
I use PHPExcel 1.7.8 and in my ODS file i've a cell with the following formula:
------------
Sheet1
Cell A1
------------
------------
Sheet2
Cell B5: =('Sheet1'.A1)
------------

If i tried to read the cell of Sheet2 o obtained the following error:
Error: Formula Error: An unexpected error occured

Which could be the solution if i have to read the ODS file?

Thank You
WorkItem.Summary: ODS file and references to value on another sheet

Comments.Message: The recognised sheet reference in formulae is that used by MS Excel, ie "='Sheet1'!A1", no provision is currently made for conversion to that from ODS
Fixed in develop branch on github
